caption.p: Historic and modern species occupancy probabilities and site richness for the Mojave avian community over the past century. Points are posterior distribution means: blue represents a significant increase (nonoverlapping historic and modern 95% credible intervals), red represents significant decreases, and orange represents species truly absent from the historic surveys. ( A) Historic and modern occupancy probabilities for 135 bird species. Error bars were omitted for visual clarity. ( B) Historic and modern site richness for 61 resurvey sites. Error bars represent 95% CRI.
